lead_paragraph: ERTLE--Edward Peter, II, 61, suddenly on June 20, 2016. Eight-time New York City marathon runner, avid biker, passionate lover of the arts, The New York Times crossword puzzle (in ink!). Lover of games, the ocean, hot peppers, seasons and all holidays, especially Christmas, and above all, family, friends and God. Loving partner to Gary for 32 joyful years. You will be deeply missed. Irreplaceable. Celebration of Life, "The Riverside," New York City, June 30, 5:30pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ERTLE, EDWARD PETER
